Structs/HBFileIO.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: loadFile(path:range:context:logger:)
Structs/HBFileIO.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: Load part of file and return response body.

Structs/HBFileIO.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: writeFile(contents:path:context:logger:)
Structs/HBFileIO.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: Write contents of request body to file

Structs/HBCacheControl.html#/s:21Humming.name: getCacheControlHeader(for:)
Structs/HBCacheControl.html#/s:21Humming.abstract: Get the Cache-Control header for a file

Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: expires
Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: indicates the maximum lifetime of the cookie

Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: maxAge
Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: indicates the maximum lifetime of the cookie in seconds. Max age has precedence over expires

Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: domain
Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: specifies those hosts to which the cookie will be sent

Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: path
Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: The scope of each cookie is limited to a set of paths, controlled by the Path attribute

Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: secure
Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: The Secure attribute limits the scope of the cookie to “secure” channels

Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: httpOnly
Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: The HttpOnly attribute limits the scope of the cookie to HTTP requests

Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.name: sameSite
Structs/HBCookie.html#/s:21HummingbirdFo.abstract: The SameSite attribute lets servers specify whether/when cookies are sent with cross-origin requests

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.name: deferredToDate
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.abstract: Defer to Date for decoding. This is the default strategy.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.name: secondsSince1970
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.abstract: Decode the Date as a UNIX timestamp from a JSON number.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.name: millisecondsSince1970
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.abstract: Decode the Date as UNIX millisecond timestamp from a JSON number.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.name: iso8601
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.abstract: Decode the Date as an ISO-8601-formatted string (in RFC 3339 format).

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.name: formatted(_:)
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.abstract: Decode the Date as a string parsed by the given formatter.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.name: custom(_:)
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.abstract: Decode the Date as a custom value encoded by the given closure.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.name: DateDecodingStrategy
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder/DateDecodi.abstract: The strategy to use for decoding Date values.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html#/s:21.name: dateDecodingStrategy
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html#/s:21.abstract: The strategy to use in Encoding dates. Defaults to .deferredToDate.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html#/s:21.name: userInfo
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html#/s:21.abstract: Contextual user-provided information for use during encoding.

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html#/s:21.name: decode(_:from:)
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html#/s:21.abstract: Decode from URL encoded form data to type

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.name: deferredToDate
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.abstract: Defer to Date for encoding. This is the default strategy.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.name: secondsSince1970
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.abstract: Encode the Date as a UNIX timestamp from a JSON number.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.name: millisecondsSince1970
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.abstract: Encode the Date as UNIX millisecond timestamp from a JSON number.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.name: iso8601
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.abstract: Encode the Date as an ISO-8601-formatted string (in RFC 3339 format).

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.name: formatted(_:)
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.abstract: Encode the Date as a string parsed by the given formatter.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.name: custom(_:)
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.abstract: Encode the Date as a custom value encoded by the given closure.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.name: DateEncodingStrategy
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder/DateEncodi.abstract: The strategy to use for encoding Date values.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.name: dateEncodingStrategy
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.abstract: The strategy to use in Encoding dates. Defaults to .deferredToDate.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.name: userInfo
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.abstract: Contextual user-provided information for use during encoding.

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.name: encode(_:)
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.abstract: Encode object into URL encoded form data

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.name: encode(_:from:)
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html#/s:21.abstract: Extend URLEncodedFormEncoder to support encoding HBResponse‘s. Sets body and header values

Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html.name: URLEncodedFormEncoder
Structs/URLEncodedFormEncoder.html.abstract: The wrapper struct for encoding Codable classes to URL encoded form data

Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html.name: URLEncodedFormDecoder
Structs/URLEncodedFormDecoder.html.abstract: The wrapper struct for decoding URL encoded form data to Codable classes

Extensions/HBRequest.html#/s:11Hummingbi.name: cookies
Extensions/HBRequest.html#/s:11Hummingbi.abstract: access cookies from request. When accessing this for the first time the HBCookies struct will be created

Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.name: encode(_:from:)
Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: Extend JSONEncoder to support encoding HBResponse‘s. Sets body and header values
